Chatgpt: 

Chatgpt was used for understanding characteristics in the dataset of different variables, and the types of significant patterns between the observations and their potential impact in the field of biophysics.

Google Dataset Search:

The dataset was sourced from Google Dataset search to understand how simulations were being applied in understanding proteins and, in a broader sense, how the formation of mutations affect our understanding of their capabilities.
